TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Engine extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class has been deprecated. Please use Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.ProjectCollection from the Microsoft.Build assembly instead.")

summary.span: 表示 MSBuild 引擎。

span.span: Represents the MSBuild engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 專案對專案相依性的系統中維護建置專案，讓您可以避免建立相同專案中的相同目標一次以上中指定的組建。In a system of project-to-project dependencies, the maintains the building projects, making it possible to avoid building the same target in the same project more than once in a given build. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並使用方法來建立專案檔。The following example creates an object and uses the method to build a project file. 類別用來將資訊記錄至檔案。The class is used to log information to a file. [!code-csharp[msbuild_BuildAProject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BuildAProject/CS/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_BuildAProject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BuildAProject/VB/Module1.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("If you were simply passing in the .NET Framework location as the BinPath, just change to the parameterless Engine() constructor. Otherwise, you can define custom toolsets in the registry or config file, or by adding elements to the Engine's ToolsetCollection. Then use either the Engine() or Engine(ToolsetLocations) constructor instead.")

param.span: 以分號分隔、有效的選擇性參數如下：

span.span: The valid semicolon-separated, optional parameters are as follows:

span.span: This path enables the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine to locate MSBuild.exe and start it as a local node.

param.span: 是主應用程式的唯一基本參數。

span.span: is the only essential parameter for a host.

param.span: 預設值為 C:\Windows\Microsoft.Net\Framework\v3.5\\。

span.span: The default value is C:\Windows\Microsoft.Net\Framework\v3.5\\.

param.span: ：表示建置完成後是否應該保留子節點以供另一個組建使用。

span.span: Indicates whether the child nodes should remain after the build finishes, in case they can be used later by another build.

param.span: 未使用超過一分鐘，便會自動捨棄子節點。

span.span: The nodes are discarded automatically after one minute of non-use.

MemberSignature.Value: public string BinPath { get; set; }
.property instance string BinPath
Public Property BinPath As String
public: property System::String ^ BinPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Avoid setting BinPath. If you were simply passing in the .NET Framework location as the BinPath, no other action is necessary. Otherwise, define Toolsets instead in the registry or config file, or by adding elements to the Engine's ToolsetCollection, in order to use a custom BinPath.")

summary.span: 取得或設定 MSBuild.exe 的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to MSBuild.exe.
The path to MSBuild.exe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]3.5，「 ToolsPath。"取代"bin 路徑 」In [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 3.5, the "BinPath" is superseded by the "ToolsPath." 因此，在。目標檔案中，使用 MSBuildToolsPath，而不是 MBBuildBinPath。Therefore, in the .Targets file, use MSBuildToolsPath rather than MBBuildBinPath. 在[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]物件模型中，「 bin 路徑 」 與您正在執行的工具組。In the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] object model, "BinPath" relates to the Toolset you are running. 取得路徑的建置引擎的步驟如下所示：The steps to get the path from the build engine are as follows: 1. 取得預設工具版本。Get the default tools version. 2. 取得工具組對應。Get the Toolset map. 3. 尋找工具組，並根據在對應中的字串。Find the Toolset, based on the string in the map. 4. 取得工具組。Get the Toolset. 5. 從工具組取得的路徑。Get the path from the Toolset. 如果您要建立的引擎，則不需要執行此程序。This procedure is not required if you are creating the engine. 在此情況下，您已經知道工具組的路徑。In that case, you already know the Toolset path. 因為方案中的專案可以使用不同的工具組，您也可以取得 MSBuild.exe 的路徑，從專案，如下所示。Because projects in a solution can use different Toolsets, you can also obtain the MSBuild.exe path from the project, as follows. ``` project.EvaluatedProperties[ReservedPropertyNames.toolsPath].FinalValue ``` 如需工具組的詳細資訊，請參閱`MSBuild Tool Set (ToolsVersion)`。For more information about Toolsets, see `MSBuild Tool Set (ToolsVersion)`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並使用方法來建立專案檔。The following example creates an object and uses the method to build a project file. 類別用來將資訊記錄至檔案。The class is used to log information to a file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載採用一組用於建置的每個專案的全域屬性，傳回目標輸出，並也可讓呼叫端指定其他組建旗標。This overload takes a set of global properties for each project to use for the build, returns the target outputs, and also enables the caller to specify additional build flags.

MemberSignature.Value: public string DefaultToolsVersion { get; set; }
.property instance string DefaultToolsVersion
Public Property DefaultToolsVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ DefaultToolsVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 此建置引擎的預設 ToolsVersion。

span.span: The default ToolsVersion of this build engine.

value.span: 表示預設 ToolsVersion 的字串。

span.span: A string that represents the default ToolsVersion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若它們否則沒有要使用哪些工具版本，專案會使用此工具版本。Projects use this ToolsVersion if they are not otherwise told which ToolsVersion to use. 這個值擷取自.exe.config 檔案或登錄。This value is retrieved from either the .exe.config file or the registry. 如果兩者都不指定預設工具版本，則版本是硬式編碼版本為"2.0"。If neither specify a default ToolsVersion, then the version is hard-coded to version "2.0." 如需工具版本的詳細資訊，請參閱[特定版本的.NET Framework 建置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8)。For more information about ToolsVersion, see [Building for Specific Versions of the .NET Framework](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8).

span.span: A that contains the global properties for the project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 全域屬性是由使用所設定的**/property**切換命令列或先建置專案時所設定的整合式的開發環境 (IDE) 的屬性。Global properties are properties that are set by using the **/property** switch on the command line, or properties that are set by the integrated development environment (IDE) before a project is built. 這些全域屬性會套用至所有使用此建置的專案。These global properties are applied to all projects that are built by using this .

summary.span: 向建置引擎註冊分散式記錄器。

span.span: Registers distributed loggers with the build engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不是安全執行緒。This method is not thread-safe. 若要確保一致的行為，建置開始之前，應該註冊所有記錄器。To ensure uniform behavior, all loggers should register before the build is started. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[撰寫能夠辨識多處理器的記錄器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff987d1b-1798-4803-9ef6-cc8fcc263516)。For more information, see [Writing Multi-Processor-Aware Loggers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff987d1b-1798-4803-9ef6-cc8fcc263516).
